PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-05482020-07-30,  ,  ,  JUS,  , 
ActTime Limits and Other Periods Act (COVID-19)
SubjectOrder Lifting Suspensions of Time Limits in Relation to Proceedings Commenced Under Certain Acts for Which the Minister of Industry is Responsible
PrecisORDER LIFTING SUSPENSIONS OF TIME LIMITS IN RELATION TO PROCEEDINGS COMMENCED UNDER CERTAIN ACTS FOR WHICH THE MINISTER OF INDUSTRY IS RESPONSIBLE in order to lift the Time Limits and Other Periods Act (COVID-19)'s suspension of certain timelines for the Bankruptcy and Insolvency Act, the Companiesâ€™ Creditors Arrangement Act and Patented Medicines (Notice of Compliance) Regulations regimes, to provide greater certainty for their operations, and to avoid unintended adverse consequences for stakeholders.
